name: SB Latest Posts
author: Spellbit

sections.description: This plugin shows the latest posts with thumbnail. This has the full control of the content and easily customizable. Widget and shortcode ready.
sections.installation:
• Upload SB Latest Posts to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory of your application
  • Login as Admin
  • Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

Usage shortcode for any page

[spellbit_latest_posts img="yes" date="yes" tag="yes" cat="yes" words="30"]

For any template
<?php echo do_shortcode('[spellbit_latest_posts img="yes" date="yes" tag="yes" cat="yes" words="30"]'); ?>
sections.faq:
• Is it a free?

yes. It is free and always be free.

short_description: Premium Quality but free. It is responsive and easily custimzeable. Video tutorials are given for usage and custimization.
description: This plugin shows the latest posts with thumbnail. This has the full control of the content and easily customizable. Widget and shortcode ready.

upgrade_notice: We will inform you if you make big changes
